Title: Introduction to Simulation, Team Training, and Crisis Management
Description: Join the faculty of the Shapiro Simulation and Skills Center at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center for a dinner meeting and hands-on simulated learning experience. You will have an opportunity to participate in a team training exercise, use partial task/procedural simulators, and learn more about the technology used in simulation.  This course is targeted to learners new to simulation training. An additional fee of $295 is required.
